column1: The goal of every business strategy is to create profitable customers by delivering superior value.  The way in which that strategy is monetized in the implementation process is critical to the success of the venture.  The key focus of the course will be the development of useful processes and metrics through the marketing and selling activities to deliver customer and corporate value which will allow managers to monitor and measure individual corporate performance.  Student learning will be assessed by a combination of class participation, weekly assignments, examinations, and team performance on final written proposals and presentations.
